nodes.title: Code cleanup and refactoring to remove duplicated code.
Allow construction blocks to use neighboring block brightness.
Fix bug where the exchanger renders block outlines for invisible blocks in an incorrect position.
Allow tools to be configured not to take damage and not use energy.
Prevent gadget key bindings from being active when not holding one.
Added a contents and a download section
Add config options for construction paste and container
V2 Added a new mode for building gadget - brush mode
ru_ru.lang; Loc. for tools modes; small cleanup
Add more config options - Switch to Config Annotations - Auto sync from server
Changed messages and tooltips to be lang provide
Make README.md reflect the content of curseforge page + Video Spotlight
Added create support for getting construction paste.
Fix the render not updating when the Template changes
Fixed error message when using a link instead of the raw data in the …
Made the pasteGUI use the current offset when changing it again.
Copypaste and exchange keep anchor on use
Fixed gadget being indicated as repairable, but isn't.
Made two lists, one for all gadgets and one specific for non copy pas…
Fixed block orientation getting lost on copy.
Fixed tile entities not reading state correctly on read.
Fixed duplication bug with auto pickups that cancel the onItemPickup …
Added hollow and filled circle mode.
Added an Interface to allow for more nuanced IItemHandlers
Fix a typo in contribution guidelines
Re-implement Copy-Paste Gadget, Undo and Item handling
Replacing entity-based renders with tile entity renderers
Fully Implement TileEntityData System to allow minor Gadgets to make use of it
Copy material list as text into clipboard
World snapshot and undo serialization algorithm
Fix bugs and formatting for 1.13.x branch
1.12.x ToolRender class cleanup and Pos fix for #289 #280 maybe
Automatically draw GUI background that is any size
Created fr_fr.json to add french translation
Building/Exchanging Gadget placement refactor and cleanup continued
Soft coded Registry Names as parameters
Added mode for raytracing fluids for all gadgets, and mode for placing in or on blocks for the building gadget.
Initial port of GUI and keybinding functionality.
Building/Exchanging Gadget placement refactor and cleanup
Add connected/unconnected surface/area mode to the building/exchanging/destruction gadgets.
Same Material Mode for Building Gadget
Make FieldWrappers internally type-safe to allow for proper checks
changed paste container variants to use polymorphism
Add ability to bind a Refined Storage network to a gadget as a remote inventory.
Fix potential, though unlikely, crash when changing the poweredByFE setting at runtime
Fix too large Templates being copied to Clipboard
Finish implementing use and item count caching of remote inventories for gadgets.
Allow template manager block to drop stored items when broken.
Support block properties called 'axis' that use the EnumFacing.Axis class.
Fixes #169, double use of all gadgets.
Prevent blocks from rending over Thaumcraft Aspects in tooltips.
Allow rebinding tooltip key. Fix for #177.
Fix Trapdoor openState not being copied. (#164)
Fix UniqueItem not overriding equals and hashcode, whilst at the same time being used as a key in HashMaps

Config Annotations+Gui and Config-Autosync from Server
Prevent gadget key bindings from being active when not holding one. (updated)
Replace null ItemStacks with empty ones, and some code cleanup.
Fixed #138 & lots of refactors and cleaning
Extended Max Energy for Destruction Tool
Add help mode to template manager GUI, along with a few other improvements to user-friendliness.
Cleanup of classes with recent merge conflicts.
